alert.note: Alert for Hansford (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 30 at 4:18AM CDT until July 31 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Texas... Palo Duro Creek at Spearman 6W affecting Hansford County. For the Palo Duro Creek...including Spearman 6W...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Palo Duro Creek at Spearman 6W. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Moderate overbank flooding occurs. Cattle are threatened and damage to fences is possible * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 AM CDT today the stage was 4.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.8 feet this afternoon. - Action stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this morning at 800 AM CDT.
